name: Jackson Safety CH300 Climbing-Style Hard Hat - Non-Vented Construction Helmet with Chin Cup - ANSI Z89.1 & OSHA Compliant - (Multiple Colors)
short_description: CLIMBING-STYLE HARD HAT - Jackson Safety's CH300 "climbing inspired" Non-Vented Hard Hat includes a comfortable and convenient chin-strap with a molded chin cup for security and stability. Ideal for height and scaffolding work in construction, manufacturing, utilities, and any trade that requires general head protection
LIGHTWEIGHT & COMFORTABLE - Molded from high density polyethylene (HDPE), the climbing-style hard hat shape is more comfortable than traditional hard hats
CUSTOM FIT - Super comfortable 6-pt suspension and Rapid-Dial ratcheting headgear for quick and easy height and fit adjustment even with gloves on; Fits head sizes 6-1/2 to 8

ACCESSORIES - Comes with a replaceable extra-absorbent sweatband; Slotted adapters allow use with multiple Jackson Safety and Sellstrom brand hard hat accessories including face shield adapters and earmuffs
MEETS STANDARDS - ANSI Z89.1 Type 1 Class C, G, and E, EN397 European Standards, and OSHA head protection requirements
product_description: Jackson Safety’s ultra-modern climbing inspired industrial hard hats are available in both vented and non-vented styes and feature a super comfortable 6-pt suspension and Rapid-Dial ratcheting headgear for quick and easy adjustment. Rapid dial ratcheting mechanism allows quick and easy adjustment even while wearing gloves. Lightweight design is molded from high density polyethylene (HDPE). Modern and stylish “climbing inspired” hard hat shape. Convenient built-in chin strap with molded chin cup provides added security. Four external clips are strategically positioned to securely fasten elastic straps found on LED lighting systems. Slotted adapters allow use with multiple PPE accessories. Includes extra-absorbent brow pad (20931) for added user convenience. Ideal for at-height and scaffolding work, confined space applications, construction sites, and general all-around head protection.

name: COOLJOB Full Brim Hard Hat, Vented Construction Safety Helmet OSHA Approved, 6-Point Ratchet Suspension, Carbon Fiber Pattern Design
short_description: [Certified Safety Standards]: This safety helmet is fully certified to meet OSHA APPROVED, EN397:2012+A1:2012, and ANSI Z89.1, Type 1, Class C standards. It ensures superior protection in various heavy-duty work environments, providing you with peace of mind while on the job.

[Durable and Comfortable Design]: Constructed from high-density polyethylene (HDPE), this helmet offers exceptional durability and impact resistance. It features an ergonomic design that enhances user comfort, making it ideal for extended wear during long work shifts.

[Advanced Suspension System]: The interior of the helmet is equipped with a 6-point suspension system that significantly enhances shock absorption and head cushioning. This structure ensures a snug yet comfortable fit, reducing the risk of injury from impacts.

[Enhanced Comfort Features]: For added comfort, the helmet includes a cushioned top pad and soft, sweat-absorbing padding around the interior. Ventilation holes on the sides of the helmet provide excellent airflow, helping to keep you cool and comfortable even in hot conditions.

[Secure Fit and Stylish Design]: The helmet comes with an adjustable chin strap and a ratchet adjustment system to ensure a secure and customized fit. This prevents the helmet from slipping off during use. Additionally, the helmet features an attractive carbon fiber pattern, combining functionality with a sleek and professional appearance.

name: Safety Helmet Hard Hat and Ear Protection, ANSI Z89.1 Approved Lightweight Vented Work Helmet Kits, 6-Point Suspension Hardhat Ideal for Industrial and Construction
short_description: 【Meets Safety Standards】Made from tough ABS material, this safety hard hat offers serious impact resistance against falling objects and bumps. It meets ANSI Z89.1-2014 Type I Class C standards, the visor complies with ANSI Z87.1-2015, and the ear muffs follow ANSI S3.19-1974

【4-in-1 Protective Hard Hat Set】This all-in-one kit includes a hard hat with chin strap, an adjustable visor, and detachable ear muffs—plus a handy drawstring bag for carrying and storage. It’s designed to deliver full head-and-neck protection in one go. The ear muffs block loud noise, and the visor resists debris without blocking your view. Each piece can be detached when not needed, giving you flexibility on the job

【Comfortable & Secure Fit】Built for long hours on site, these construction helmets come with a 6-point suspension system that spreads weight evenly and cuts down pressure on your head and neck. The Y-shaped chin strap with a molded cup keeps the hard hat firmly in place. Sized to fit most men and women, it adjusts from 20.86" to 24.80", so you get a custom fit every time

【Stay Cool & Dry】Engineered to beat the heat, this hard hat for men includes sliding vents to boost airflow and let heat escape. We’ve also included a sweat-wicking liner, that pulls moisture away and helps it evaporate fast. No more sweat in your eyes, no distractions. Just cool, dry focus

【High-Visibility & Built for Work】Reflective stickers on the helmet increase visibility in low light, helping keep you safe from dawn till dusk. Perfect for construction, woodworking, utilities, forestry, scaffolding, and more. This hard hat with ear muffs brings together safety, comfort, and convenience—everything you need for hard work
product_description: Introducing the ultimate safety helmet for all your industrial and construction needs - the TREE HELMET Hard Hat with Visor and Ear Protection! This 3 in 1 Helmet Kit comes with an additional cooling helmet liner and waterproof drawstring bag, making it the perfect gear for all your outdoor activities. With sliding vent holes and an easy flip-up visor, this adjustable lightweight vented ABS work helmet provides maximum protection and comfort. The 6-Point Suspension and one-handed adjustment design ensure a perfect fit for sizes ranging from 53-63cm/ 20.86-24.80 inch. This helmet meets ANSI Z89.1-2014 Type I Class C standards, and the visors meet ANSI Z87.1-2015 standards, providing a NRR up to 25dB. Ideal for construction, tree climbing work, woodworking, forestry, height and scaffolding work, and any trade that requires general head protection. Don't compromise on safety - choose the TREE HELMET Hard Hat with Visor and Ear Protection for the ultimate protection and peace of mind!

short_description: LOW PROFILE: Compact, lightweight safety helmet design for at-height and confined space applications
PROTECTION: ANSI Z89.1-2014(R2019) CLASS E, TYPE-2 Safety Helmet protects against top, front, back, and side impacts and provides up to 20kV protection
PATENTED ACCESSORY MOUNTS: Mounts designed for quick click-in on and off attachment of Klein accessories; no straps needed
ALL DAY COMFORT: Breathable padded sweat-wicking sweatband, and top pad are machine washable
STABLE AND SECURE FIT: 6-Point suspension and chin strap improve stability and comfort, even when tilting your head
UNIVERSAL ACCESSORY SLOTS: Universal accessory slots on both sides, designed to accommodate essential add-ons such as hearing protection, face shields, and more

product_description: Klein Tools Type-2 Safety Helmets are engineered for optimal safety, comfort and fit. Compact, lightweight helmet design, with chin strap, allows to comfortably work in confined spaces and at-height applications with up to 20kV of protection. Patented accessory mounts on front and back ensure optional Klein Headlamps attach securely; no straps needed. Padded and washable sweatband enhance comfort and fit. Optional Klein Tools half face visors, full face shields and hearing protection can be mounted to these helmets.

name: 3M Hard Hat SecureFit H-700 Series Cap Style Safety Helmet with Uvicator Sensor, 4-Point Pressure Diffusion Ratchet Suspension
short_description: SECUREFIT PRESSURE DIFFUSION TECHNOLOGY: Flexes and self-adjusts to the size of the wearer's head. Reduces pressure and increases comfort for all day wear. Fits head sizes from 6-1/4 to 8 (50-64 cm)
OPTIMIZED COMFORT: With 2 levels of height adjustment. Contains a premium washable and replaceable sweatband that is made of moisture-wicking material designed to help keep workers cool and dry
3M UVICATOR SENSOR: A visual cue when it's time to replace the hard hat due to UV exposure

PROTECTION AND COMFORT: H-Series non-vented hats meet ANSI/ISEA Z89.1 Type 1, Class G and E requirements. H-Series vented hats meet ANSI/ISEA Z89.1 Type 1, Class C requirements. H-Series non-vented hats meet CSA Z94.1 Type 1 Class G and E requirements. Cap-style H-700 series vented construction hard hats meet CSA Z94.1 Type 1 Class C requirements
COMPATIBLE: With cap-attached 3M hearing protection and communication products, a variety of 3M faceshields and other accessories
product_description: The 3M SecureFit H-Series Hard Hats provides 3M innovation in comfort while maintaining the traditional cap and full brim design that many prefer. If you wear a hard hat for a full shift, you want it to be comfortable and fit properly. 3M recognizes this and has responded by designing a suspension system that self-adjusts to the wearer as the ratchet is tightened. Chosen 9 times out of 10 over current conventional hard hats*, this suspension system flexes and self-adjusts to the size of the wearers head, reducing forehead pressure and increasing comfort for all-day wear. Footnote: **End-user survey conducted by 3M, November 2020 March 2021. Participants were allowed to keep the new 3M hard hat. Help give your workers an excellent blend of comfort, style and safety with 3M SecureFit Hard Hat Series. Available in cap style or full brim models, the suspension system incorporates patented Pressure Diffusion Technology and sits low on the head for greater comfort and security. Select models feature a proprietary indicator that lets wearer know when to replace helmet due to UV exposure. All models meet ANSI Z89.1 Safety Compliance Standards.
